CustomField.formula: if( AND( Discretionary_Line_Item__r.Discretionary_Request__r.Campaign__c != Null, Discretionary_Line_Item__r.Discretionary_Request__r.Opportunity__c = Null), NULL ,if( AND( Discretionary_Line_Item__r.Discretionary_Request__r.Opportunity__c!= Null, Discretionary_Line_Item__r.Discretionary_Request__r.Campaign__c = Null), Discretionary_Line_Item__r.Discretionary_Request__r.Opportunity__r.Program__c ,NULL))
CustomField.label: Program
